works.title: Learning Processes and Acquisition of Knowledge and Skills in Training and Supervision of Psychotherapy and Counselling: A Study Protocol for a Scoping Review

rg.name: Cecilie Hillestad Hoff
rg.affiliation: University of Oslo, Department of Psychology

works.title: Learning Processes and Acquisition of Knowledge and Skills in Training and Supervision of Psychotherapy and Counselling: A Study Protocol for a Scoping Review
works.abstract:
Background: Increased awareness of the individual therapist’s vital contribution to
treatment processes and outcome, and the potential role of training and supervision in
this respect, warrants a close look at the empirical and theoretical literature on teaching
and learning of therapists and counselors.
Methods: A scoping review of the literature...
